Package arcade.env.loc

Class HexLocation

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.loc.HexLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Location, java.io.Serializable
public class HexLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
Implementation of Location for hexagonal Grid to a triangular Lattice.

Grid coordinates are in terms of (u, v, w) and the Lattice coordinates are in (x, y). Hexagons are flat side up. Triangular Lattice positions are numbered 0 - 5, with 0 at the top center and going clockwise around. 

      -------
     / \ 0 / \
    / 5 \ / 1 \
    -----------
    \ 4 / \ 2 /
     \ / 3 \ /
      -------
In (u, v, w) coordinates, only coordinates where u + v + w = 0 are valid. For simulations with HEIGHT > 0 (3D simulations), each the hexagonal grid is offset in one of two directions relative to the triangular lattice. Therefore, each cell in a location has six neighboring locations in the same layer, three neighboring locations in the layer above, and three neighboring locations in the layer below. Simulations with HEIGHT > 1 must have a MARGIN > 0, otherwise the offset location coordinates will be associated with lattice coordinates that are out of bounds of the array.
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.3.2
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • updateConfigs

      public static void updateConfigs​(Series series)
      Updates static configuration variables.

      Environment sizes are not set until the simulation series is created. Calculations for coordinates depend on these sizes, so the Location needs to be updated based on the series configuration.

      Parameters:
      series - the current simulation series

    • calcPerimeter

      public double calcPerimeter​(double f)
      Calculates the perimeter of a cell occupying the location.

      Estimates the perimeter of cell occupying the hexagonal location. Volume fraction used to take fraction of the perimeter of the hexagon. If fraction is not 1 (i.e. at least two cells in the location), then two additional inner segments are added.

      Specified by:
      calcPerimeter in interface Location
      Parameters:
      f - the fraction of total volume
      Returns:
      the perimeter of the cell

    • updateLocation

      public void updateLocation​(Location loc)
      Updates hexagonal and triangular locations based on given Location.
      Specified by:
      updateLocation in interface Location
      Parameters:
      loc - the reference location

    • calcTriangular

      private void calcTriangular()
      Calculates triangular coordinates based on hexagonal coordinates and offset.

    • calcChecks

      private void calcChecks()
      Updates the possible moves that can be made.

      Each direction of movement (+u, -u, +v, -v, +w, -w, +z, -z) is tracked by each bit within a byte.

    • getNeighborLocations

      public sim.util.Bag getNeighborLocations()
      Gets the location of the neighbors to the current location

      We check if a neighbor location is valid by comparing the movement checks byte with the neighbor location byte. Neighbor list includes the current location.

      Specified by:
      getNeighborLocations in interface Location
      Returns:
      the list of neighbor locations
